name: SKYDEMON
description:
Please play in fullscreen mode with the blue expand button for the best experience!

You are a demon ascending to take over heaven, the goal is to take out every angel along the way BUT be careful to not over-use and run out of axes!

This game was made for 7dfps, a game jam where I made SKYDEMON in a week. Have fun playing SKYDEMON, this is the first game I've ever published so have fun and let me know what you like or dislike about it (: 

HUGE SHOUTOUT to @HanzilProductions for producing the music for this game!
